H0.text: Haematoma and Ecchymosis are medical terms which more commonly are called a. Contusion

H1.text: Haematoma and Ecchymosis are medical terms which more commonly are called a. Lesion

H2.text: Haematoma and Ecchymosis are medical terms which more commonly are called a. Swelling

H3.text: Haematoma and Ecchymosis are medical terms which more commonly are called a. Bruise

A4.text: A bruise, also known as a contusion, is a type of hematoma of tissue
